description: Gets metadata information about a slot.

parameters.name: slotId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the slot.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot associated with the slot.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot associated with the slot.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the slot to describe. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

parameters.name: intentId
parameters.description: The identifier of the intent that contains the slot.
